originContent: for native inclusion into LaTeX or ConTeXt documents.
translatedContent: 以便原生地包含到 LaTeX 或 ConTeXt 文档中。

originContent: The output of matplot2tikz is in [PGFPlots](https://github.com/pgf-tikz/pgfplots/), a TeX
translatedContent: matplot2tikz 的输出格式是 [PGFPlots](https://github.com/pgf-tikz/pgfplots/)，这是一个 TeX

originContent: library that sits on top of [PGF/TikZ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PGF/TikZ) and
describes graphs in terms of axes, data etc. Consequently, the output of matplot2tikz
translatedContent: 以坐标轴、数据等方式描述图形。因此，matplot2tikz 的输出

originContent: -   can be more easily understood, and
\addplot [line width=1.64pt, chocolate2267451, mark=*, mark size=3, mark options={solid}]
translatedContent: \addplot [line width=1.64pt, chocolate2267451, mark=*, mark size=3, mark options={solid}]

（如果你想要代码字符串，使用 `get_tikz_code()` 而不是 `save()`。）

originContent: (Use `get_tikz_code()` instead of `save()` if you want the code as a string.)

translatedContent: 调整图表非常简单，可以作为你的 TeX 工作流程的一部分完成。

originContent: Tweaking the plot is straightforward and can be done as part of your TeX work flow.

translatedContent: 许多如何让你的图表看起来更好的优秀示例。

originContent: great examples of how to make your plot look even better.

translatedContent: 当然，并非所有由 matplotlib 生成的图形都能无误转换。

originContent: Of course, not all figures produced by matplotlib can be converted without error.

This matplot2tikz library originated from the [tikzplotlib](https://github.com/nschloe/tikzplotlib)

originContent: 4. Install `uv` using `pip install uv` and then `tox-uv` using `uv pip install tox-uv`.
